column5: I was wondering if anyone knows of a web link that contains the dates that big Bass Touraments are held on Rice Lake?  I am heading up there for a week in July and was hoping to avoid a weekend that one of them are going on there.
I don't blame you a bit!!!
My cottage is on Rice... I feel your pain. I don't know the exact tourney schedule, but know that there is quite a few in July.
August 8th Rice Lake $200 for team entry August 9th Rice Lake $200 for team entry

CSFL has some July 4/5.  CBAF has their Qualifier for Team Canada going to Lake Champlain on July 11/12.  CSFL will probably have close to 100 boats.  CBAF between 40-80.  Other than that, I'd guess there will be club events there, but no other major events that I'm aware of.
big fat bass used to summarize most of the Canadian/Ontario circuits for the year  probably extreme angler would have a similar page or link
fish in october cause there every week it seems, i havent fished rice lake in years for that exact reason

If your going for a week, you'll have 5 days on Rice by yourself! just go! you have as much right to fish as anyone, I fish tourneys but I also like to fun fish, I personally don't like jetski's buzzing around me on weekends, but lets face it -the Kawartha lakes have a lot of people on them! there are a lot of spots to fish even during tournaments!
